entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning before morning. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
